tool_description: Free API - Validate Number - Calculate Rates - And more!
name: EUVAT
title: EUVAT

api_list.name: /api/validate/{vatnumber}
/api/rate/{countrycode}
api_list.description: Get rate for a specific country

api_list.name: /api/iseu/{countrycode}
/api/ip/{ipaddress}
/api/info/{vatnumber}
api_list.description: Get company info using the EU VAT

api_list.name: /api/ip/detect
api_list.description: Get VAT by IP auto detect
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://neo22s-euvat-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/ip/detect"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "neo22s-euvat-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
